title: agessc_Omon has not been reset after branch from piControl
description: The tracer variable agessc_Omon (sea_water_age_since_surface_contact) has not been reset to zero after branching from piControl.  For the affected simulations a correction is not possible as a rerun of the simulation would be required. It has been decided, however, that for these simulations the faulty data will not be retracted.
